definition: hair/drawing brush/(in the) least/one thousandth/currency unit, 0.1 yuan
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
"cover" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 14), occurring in 軍|军[jun1], 冠[guan1] etc, known as 禿寶蓋|秃宝盖[tu1 bao3 gai4] or 平寶蓋|平宝盖[ping2 bao3 gai4]

hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])
not in the least/to completely lack
the slightest amount or degree/a bit
hardly/not in the least/not at all
to write or draw with a brush/to put pen to paper/to write
one thread, one hair (idiom); a tiny bit/an iota
lit. seeing clearly the downy feathers of autumn (idiom, from Mencius)/fig. perceptive of even the finest detail

sentences.english: Without it. life will be empty and meaningless.
sentences.chinese: 沒有它，人生將是樸陋的而且毫偶然義的。

sentences.english: Dachshund has no doubt about who' s dog it is.
sentences.chinese: 任何看見臘腸毫疑問都道誰狗。

sentences.english: Tianzhu sword cents produced in Tianzhu County area, is a green tea category.
sentences.chinese: 天柱劍毫產於縣天柱山一帶，屬綠茶類。

sentences.english: It causes a current of 250,000 nanoamperes to flow though us.
sentences.chinese: 它導致了一個250，000毫微安的電流流過我們。

sentences.english: The fuel-coated nanotubes could replace batteries for cell phones and other devices.
sentences.chinese: 有燃料塗層的毫微管可以替代手機和其它裝置的電池。

sentences.english: I can't understand his resigning his job.
sentences.chinese: 對孩子這樣毫不經意，我不能理解。

definition: Li (c. 2000 BC), sixth of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God, also known as Ai 哀[Ai1]
a Chinese foot/one-third of a meter/a ruler/a tape-measure/one of the three acupoints for measuring pulse in Chinese medicine/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3]
one of the characters used to represent a musical note in gongche notation, 工尺譜|工尺谱[gong1 che3 pu3]
Buddhist monastery, temple or shrine (abbr. for 剎多羅, Sanskrit ksetra)
an instant (Sanskrit: ksana)/split second/the twinkling of an eye
to force/to compel/to approach or go towards/urgent/pressing
